long_description: The Swany X-Change gloves are ideal for skiing or riding anything from the burly backcountry to corduroy slopes. Rugged polester soft-shell fabric with leather palms protects hands and offers outstanding grip and flexibility. Waterproof, breathable Dryfinger II(R) inserts keep your hands dry and comfortable. Tri-plex(R) insulation is thicker on the back of the hands, thinner on the palms and stretches on the sidewalls for exceptional warmth. Anatomically curved, rolled finger construction promotes comfort and flexibility. Gloves feature pockets that are perfect for hand warmer heat packs; secured with locking, water-resistant zippers. Swany X-Change gloves feature over-the-cuff gauntlets with leashes and quick-release straps to enhance protection and comfort.
